text:
Created attachment 30553
patch to update declaration

The test/webapp-2.4 web.xml is using an incorrect namespace and location - it contains "javaee" where for 2.4 it should be "j2ee"
creator: jboynes@apache.org

text: Thanks for the report and the patch. Fix is in trunk.
creator: violetagg@apache.org

text: ... and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.43 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
